name: Rightful Reward
description:
Character's Elemental Burst deals +2 DMG.
After your active character takes DMG or is healed: Gain 1 Principle of Justice point. If this card has already accumulated 3 such points, consume 3 points and grant this character 1 Energy.
(Only Polearm Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
